name: Counter Reflexes

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Anticipate Dodge, Dodge, Mobility; base attack bonus +9, brawler level 6th, or monk level 6th.

sections.text: Opponents with the Mobility feat do not gain the dodge bonus granted by that feat when they provoke attacks of opportunity by moving out of or within your threatened area.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: base attack bonus +9, brawler level 6th, or monk level 6th
description: Your opponent's advanced training in moving around you is surpassed only by your readiness for it.
